alert.note: Alert for Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:07PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jefferson, north central Bonneville, south central Madison and northeastern Bingham Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 305 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ucon, or near Rigby, moving north northwest at 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph, half inch hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ririe Reservoir, Ammon, Iona, Ririe and Heise. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Upper Snake River Plain
